text: Nothing in human nature is so God-like as the disposition to do good to our fellow-creatures.
author: Samuel Richardson

text: Nothing. We're all friends and friendly. So when the cameras go down, depending on the mood or the nature of the material we're dealing with, there's usually a kind of a prevailing light attitude that's floating around.
author: Richard Dean Anderson

text: One of the greatest pains to human nature is the pain of a new idea.
author: Walter Bagehot

text: I never sort of thought of myself as a comedy writer, by nature.
author: Lena Dunham
